name: Overloading
description:
If you can't find the right way, then write to me on discord (@Rikky#9309), I will send a map with the right way


Overloading - a game consisting of one, but very difficult level. It takes time and practice to get through. You play as a microchip and you have to stop overloading.

As you play, be prepared, not everything is what you think.
